chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Good day,
I purchased this phone two weeks ago and it should have arrived in excellent condition. However, there are two small scratches near the screen on the casing, although it should not show any noticeable signs of use from at least 20cm away, which is not the case here. This does not meet my expectations and I would like to request a replacement. Thank you very much!

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for exchange, the 23.05.2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 29.05.2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Nisa from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
